about_the_game: This is the demo for my Chronicles of Veldoria video game. It has a limited amount of story and features. You can learn skills but less than the whole Early Access game.
detailed_description: This is the demo for my Chronicles of Veldoria video game. It has a limited amount of story and features. You can learn skills but less than the whole Early Access game.
name: Chronicles of Veldoria Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: This is the demo for my Chronicles of Veldoria video game. It has a limited amount of story and features. You can learn skills but less than the whole Early Access game.
